title: Transfer All Address Book Contacts
content:
I would like to share all my contacts in my Address book. When I click on Export, Thunderbird exports my profile and address book into one file. This file is unreadable by others. All I want to do is share all my contacts.

Darryl
creator: dcady

title: CAN NOT FIND FOLDER AND MAIL
content: 수신한 메일을 폴더로 옮기는 중,에러가 발생하여 다른 폴더와 함께 메일이 없어졌습니다,해당 폴더에 보관된 메일들은 수신한 이력은 남아 있으나 메일 내용 확인이 불가능합니다 사라진 폴더는 메일시스템에서 찾아볼수 없습니다 어떻게 해결해야 할까요?

title: Cannot move new email account inbox
content: Hi, thanks in advance! I have several email addresses set up in Thunderbird. The incoming emails for all come into the global inbox with each having its own folder within that inbox. Today, I added a new email account and the folders for this account, including the inbox, are all in a separate folder. I cannot move the inbox up so it's in that global inbox with all of the others. I've searched for answers, but can't find one that works.
creator: chrisfallsupward

title: Mac: Add "Services" context menu when composing new mail
content:
macOS allows applications to register their entries to the "Services" menu, that appears with right-click on items in the Finder but also in applications where you can write text. I need that menu in the text field where you compose a new email. Is that possible to activate?

My workaround is now to write the text somewhere else where the menu is available, apply it and then copy-paste the result.
creator: mozilla446

title: Save Thunderbird settings
content:
I have installed the latest version of Thunderbird. I have adjusted the settings . Everything looks fine, but how do I save those settings so they are applied next time I open Thunderbird?

I am using Windows 10. I want to save Table View and Descending Sort Order.
creator: flank1

title: TB128  : filename additional information (tags, forwarded etc) for every (IMAP-) email-message
content:
Hi,

I remember from the past, the existence of a file (with a strange name) which contained additional information (tags, forwarded etc) for every (IMAP-) email-message.

Problem is, I can't find it any more, and (stupid me) I forgot it's name and where it's located.

Could someone please

  • help my memory with the name and where it's (or was) located
  • AND when it has been replaced in TB128 by something else, what that something is and where it's located

Thank you

title: otwieranie pdf w tworzonej wiadomości
content:
Cześć

Nie mogę otwierać plików pdf w tworzonej wiadomości:


Plik C:\Users\marec\OneDrive\Pulpit\FV MC naprawa auta.pdf nie może zostać otwarty, ponieważ powiązana z nim aplikacja pomocnicza nie istnieje. Zmień powiązania dla tego typu pliku w preferencjach.

Natomiast pliki pdf załączone w poczcie, która otrzymuję mogę otworzyć np. z Foxit lub Ashampoo.

Jak w ustawieniach można rozwiązać ten problem?
creator: marecki6

title: niet in kunnen loggen bij Thunderburd om ingekomen mail te lezen
content: Op 2 augustus 2025, wilde ik mijn e-mail bekijken. Kreeg een klein rechthoekje met daar de melding : Couldn't load XPCOM ok en met X daarin Vervolgens via Google Thunderbird ingetikt, waarop ik op een omslachtige manier mijn mail binnen kreeg via Thunderbird. Ik moet dan op een andere indirecte manier het bericht binnen zien te krijgen. I Ik wil op de normale, gewend zijnde manier via thunderbird kunnen emailen. Hoe is dat op te lossen.

title: My Saved Address Book Issues:
content: What is preventing my saved email addresses to actually show they are currently saved when I scroll over the "Save this address in the address book" icon whenever I know I've clicked to save them? A lot of my email addresses I click to save never shows them to where it says "Edit Contact" when I scroll over that icon again, and it's aggravating when they'll even show in my address book when I look into that noticing that the same exact contacts are being shown multiple times from me clicking the "Save this address in the address book" thinking it hasn't been done yet when it has! This has went on for the past several months now and didn't just start happening!

title: Thunderbird no longer displays message contents
content:
Win10-64 TBird 141.0 64-bit everything fully upated

Yesterday T'Bird stopped displaying the message content in a pane below the messages list when I single-clicked on the message. A double-click does display the message contents in a new pop-up pane/tab, but this is quite inconvenient.

I don't know what I did to cause this, but I'd like to go back!
creator: DuncanRhodes

title: Sometimes my Earthlink password doesn't work in Thunderbird
content: At least once a day I'll get a popup message that says my Earthlink password has failed and gives the option to Retry or Cancel. If I press Retry, the password works and I can download my email but the email alert sound keeps playing over and over until I have to shut down Thunderbird and relaunch it to stop it from doing that. I've had to disable incoming mail alerts. I've checked my email settings with Earthlink and they're all correct. I'm currently using version 128.12.0esr (64-bit) on Ubuntu but this has happened on multiple versions over the last few years.
creator: euphgeek

title: Thunderbird Saved Search keeps deleting
content:
I'm using Thunderbird on a MacBook Pro with multiple M365 and Google Workspace accounts. I have created two Saved Searches, which are in Favorites Folders and perform as intended (one searching multiple email addresses across multiple Inboxes). A third search has been created several times and keeps disappearing. It searches for all Inbox email across 3 accounts and searches for 6 different emails (To: or cc:). This third search is actually where I spend most of my day, so it's important to me. Any thoughts???

Thanks in advance.
creator: john369

title: Problem with saving templates
content:
I am trying to save a template and TB (141.00) keeps saving it in the 'Local Folders' template subfolder. I found this archived thread about this issue: https://support.mozilla.org/km/questions/1420516

I have changed the target folder to the appropriate account subfolder, closed/restarted TB, and this behavior persists. Anybody got a solution?
creator: apogeemail2
